translation.en: - Seat belts, everyone! - Please let this be a normal field trip.
translation.es: - ¡Abróchense los cinturones! - Que sea una excursión normal.

translation.en: With the Friz? - No way! - Aw!
♪ Cruisin' on down Main Street You're relaxed and feelin' good ♪
translation.es: Rodando por la calle principal Vas relajado y contento

translation.en: ♪ Next thing that you know You're seein' ♪
♪ Octopus in the neighborhood! ♪
♪ Surfin' on a sound wave Swingin' through the stars ♪ Yee- ha!
translation.es: Surfeando una onda de sonido Volando entre las estrellas

translation.en: ♪ Take a left at your intestine Take your second right past Mars ♪
translation.es: A la izquierda de tu intestino Gira en Marte

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus Navigate a nostril ♪
- Achoo! - ♪ Climb on the Magic School Bus ♪
translation.es: - Explora una fosa - ¡Achís! Sube al autobús mágico

translation.en: - ♪ Spank a plankton, too ♪ - Take that!
♪ On our Magic School Bus Raft a river of lava ♪
translation.es: En el autobús escolar mágico Surfea un río de lava

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus Such a fine thing to do! ♪
♪ So strap your bones right to the seat Come on in and don't be shy ♪
translation.es: Abróchate bien al asiento Vamos, no seas tímido

translation.en: ♪ Just to make your day complete You might get baked into a pie ♪
translation.es: Para completar tu día Quizá te horneen en un pastel

translation.en: ♪ On the Magic School Bus Step inside, it's a wilder ride! ♪
translation.es: En el autobús escolar mágico ¡Sube, es un viaje salvaje!

translation.en: ♪ Come on! Ride on the Magic School Bus! ♪
Thank goodness! I was afraid of what I might find.
translation.es: Gracias al cielo. Tenía miedo de lo que podía encontrar.

translation.en: Something could've changed over the summer.
translation.es: Quizá en el verano algo cambió.

translation.en: Nope, nothing different, except Jyoti, of course.
translation.es: No, nada es diferente. Salvo Jyoti, claro.

translation.en: Arnold's not big on change.
Everything's exactly like it was when we left last year.
translation.es: Todo está igual a como lo dejamos el año pasado.

translation.en: Welcome to your first day. I'll show you around.
translation.es: Bienvenida, Jyoti. Te mostraré el lugar.

translation.en: Exciting.
But from what you guys said, I thought everything would be more magical.
translation.es: Por lo que dijeron, creí que todo sería más mágico.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry. It will be. First, the normal stuff.
translation.es: No te preocupes, lo será. Primero, lo normal.

translation.en: Like how everybody sits in the same place every class.
translation.es: Todos se sientan siempre en el mismo lugar.

translation.en: And how we all have jobs. It's a delicate balance.
translation.es: Tenemos tareas. Es un delicado equilibrio.

translation.en: Wanda and DA handle the brain builders, and Ralphie annoys the skeleton.
translation.es: Wanda y Dorotea son el cerebro, Rafa molesta al esqueleto.

translation.en: Yeah, but he never gets rattled.
translation.es: Sí, pero no le da cosquillas.

translation.en: I handle the worrying for all of us.
Cool! It's like you have your own balanced ecosystem.
According to my research, you're right. An ecosystem is--
translation.es: Según mi investigación, un ecosistema es...

translation.en: A community of plants and animals with roles to play.
- How'd you know that? - An old pizza box I left under my bed.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo sabes? - Una caja de pizza bajo mi cama.

translation.en: My mom called it the world's smelliest biome. - Ugh. -
translation.es: Mi mamá le decía el bioma apestoso.

translation.en: Where do I fit in?
I bet we'll find out before the day's over.
translation.es: Aún no lo sé. Pero lo sabremos pronto.

translation.en: You can have Phoebe's seat. She went back to her old school.
translation.es: Siéntate en el lugar de Phoebe. Volvió a su otra escuela.

translation.en: - There she is. - Get ready, everybody.
That's awesome.
Told ya! Now, get ready for the Friz and her mug in 14.2 seconds.
translation.es: Te lo dije. Prepárate para Rizos y su taza en 14,2 segundos.

translation.en: Ms. Frizzle always gets here at exactly the same time, and puts her mug--
translation.es: La Srta. Rizos siempre llega a la misma hora y pone su taza...

translation.en: - That we made for her. - In the exact same spot on her desk.
translation.es: - Hecha por nosotros. - En el mismo lugar en su escritorio.

translation.en: In three, two, one...
That's weird, one second late.
Ms. Frizzle!
- Hi, Miss-- -
You're not Ms. Frizzle.
Oh, but I am, Arnold.
And may I just say, I'm so glad you didn't stay home today.
translation.es: Me alegra que no te hayas quedado en casa hoy.

translation.en: Hey, Tim! Love your artwork.
translation.es: Hola, Tim. Me encanta tu arte.

translation.en: How was your summer at the animal rescue?
Keesha, oh, love the outfit. Jyoti, welcome to your first day.
translation.es: Rita, me encanta tu ropa. Jyoti, bienvenida.

translation.en: Ralphie, I see you had oatmeal this morning, you're wearing it.
translation.es: Rafa. Veo que desayunaste avena. La llevas puesta.

translation.en: Carlos, iguana say hi to you, too!
translation.es: Carlos, te digo hola con una ola.

translation.en: And, DA, according to your research, you must realize...
translation.es: Dorotea, según tu investigación, debes darte cuenta...

translation.en: - It's a different Frizzle. -
Ms. Frizzle?
- Hey, Val. - Whoa. Total Frizzle overload.
Actually, you can now call me Professor Frizzle, PhD.
translation.es: Ahora pueden llamarme profesora Rizos, doctora.

translation.en: The first of many changes this year.
Changes?
Class, please welcome your new science teacher,
translation.es: Clase, denle la bienvenida a su nueva maestra,

translation.en: and my little sister, Ms. Fiona Felicity Frizzle.
translation.es: mi hermanita, la Srta. Fiona Felicity Rizos.

translation.en: What?
What?
This can't be.
Now, where to put my special, magical, crazy- growing,
translation.es: ¿Dónde pongo mi enredadera mágica que crece y crece

translation.en: must- stay- in- a- pot Crescit Leiunium Frizzlaeia vine?
translation.es: y debe ir en maceta Crescit Leiunium Rizaeia?

translation.en: That's the question of the day. How about here?
translation.es: Es la pregunta del día. ¿Qué tal aquí?

translation.en: - - Yes! But, but, but...
So much to do today, kids. To the Bus!
translation.es: Hay mucho que hacer hoy. ¡Al autobús!

translation.en: New teacher or not, that plant does not belong in the special spot.
translation.es: Maestra nueva o no, esa planta no va en el lugar especial.

translation.en: Class, my sensational sister will be taking over this year,
translation.es: Mi sensacional hermana les enseñará este año.

translation.en: with Liz's help, of course.
- But what about you? -
As a research professor, I'll be traveling the universe.
translation.es: Como investigadora, iré por el universo.

translation.en: Traversing the ages, exploring quantum realities.
Your basic fact- finding flummerydiddle.
What about us? We need to be taking chances.
And making mistakes.
And getting messy!
Oh, don't you worry, you'll get plenty of that.
Bus, do your stuff.
Hmm. Something's missing. Wait.
Fiona, the keys.
translation.es: - Falta algo. Esperen. - Fiona. Las llaves.

translation.en: - Whoa, thanks, sis. -
Come along, everyone.
Awesome!
- I wonder where we're going. - It's a mystery. Don't ya love it?
- All right! - Yay, a field trip.
Even my seat is different.
After it was all worked in and everything.
translation.es: Ya lo tenía amoldado y todo.

translation.en: Seat belts, everyone!
- - Surprising.
So many modes to choose from. But which one do we pick? Oh...
translation.es: Cuántos modos para elegir. Pero ¿cuál escogemos?

translation.en: Ah! Here we go.
All good, class?
I'm guessing you don't get motion sick much.
translation.es: Veo que no te mareas con el movimiento.

translation.en: - - Ah! We're here!
Good. Because I cannot get off this bus fast enough--
translation.es: Bien. No puedo salir lo bastante rápido...

translation.en: Hang in there, Arnold.
I haven't lost a kid yet... this year.
translation.es: Aún no he perdido ningún niño este año.

translation.en: - - Kidding or am I? You'll never know.
She may be new, but she knows how to work the wedgie- nator.
translation.es: Es nueva, pero ya sabe usar el calzón-chinador.

translation.en: She seems nice and everything, but I'm not sure about her parking skills.
translation.es: Parece simpática, pero no sé si sabe estacionar.

translation.en: How much do I love this bus?
- That was close. -
That was exciting.
Since we're here, wherever we are, we might as well look around, right?
translation.es: Ya que estamos aquí, podemos salir a mirar un poco.

translation.en: Where are we anyway?
According to my research, we're in the Galapagos Islands.
translation.es: Según mi investigación, estamos en Galápagos.

translation.en: Fi- o- na! How you doin', gal?
Galapagos Gil! What's up, bear- man?
- - They know each other?
Like the animals here,
the only place you find Galapagos Gil is the Galapagos Islands.
translation.es: Galápagos Gil solo está en las Islas Galápagos.

translation.en: I'm rarer than a screen door on a submarine.
translation.es: Soy más raro que un mosquitero en un submarino.

translation.en: Everything here lives in perfect balance.
translation.es: Todo aquí vive en perfecto equilibrio.

translation.en: Look at this way healthy, way special ecosystem.
translation.es: Miren este ecosistema saludable y especial.

translation.en: You know, Ms. Frizzle, whenever we used to go on a trip,
translation.es: Srta. Rizos, cuando nos íbamos de excursión,

translation.en: Professor Frizzle used to, how do I put this, enhance the experience.
translation.es: la profesora Rizos... ¿Cómo decirlo? Mejoraba la experiencia.

translation.en: - Ah, with sandwiches? - With magic!
You know, as my great- aunt Clair Voyant used to say, I knew you were going to say that.
translation.es: Como decía mi tía abuela Clara Vidente: Sabía que dirían eso.

translation.en: She smelled like onions in the worst possible way.
translation.es: Olía a cebollas, lo peor que puedan imaginar.

translation.en: Hey!
Talk about a turtle surprise!
Carlos!
- Nice! - I have serious remote envy.
translation.es: - Qué bien. - Le envidio el control remoto.

translation.en: The glasses show you how the parts of the ecosystem fit together.
translation.es: Las gafas muestran las relaciones del ecosistema.

translation.en: Mushrooms point to grasshoppers, point to owls?
- What does that mean? - Follow Carlos and Wanda's arrows.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Sigan las flechas de Carlos y Wanda.

translation.en: Plants grow, tortoises eat the leaves,
translation.es: La tortuga come las hojas de la planta,

translation.en: ticks bite the tortoises and finches eat the ticks.
translation.es: la garrapata muerde a la tortuga y el pinzón se la come.

translation.en: These are actually...  pretty tasty.
The kid in me says, Eww. The finch in me says, Nom- nom- nom!
translation.es: El niño en mí dice: Asco, y el pinzón: Sabroso.

translation.en: Unexpected. Everything here is interconnected.
Ding- ding- ding! Nailed it, new kid.
Everything's got a role to play, and that keeps everything stable.
translation.es: Todo cumple un papel. Así se mantiene estable.

translation.en: Since this is an island by itself in the middle of the ocean,
translation.es: Como es una isla en el medio del océano,

translation.en: it has its own natural balance.
Come along, everyone.
- Uh, Ms. Frizzle? - Can you change us back to--
Oh, I'm next.
Oh, I love this thing. Just say when.
When!
- Aw. - Let's go!
Galapagos Gil, with everything in unison,
translation.es: Galápagos Gil, como todo está en armonía,

translation.en: don't you worry about something throwing that off?
You bet your giant tortoise we do. That's why we inspect everything.
translation.es: Por las tortugas gigantes, claro. Por eso inspeccionamos todo.

translation.en: You mean like luggage, coats, hats? Everything?
Everything. So no new plants or animals get here.
translation.es: ¡Todo! Así no entran plantas ni animales nuevos.

translation.en: - Accidents happen, you know. - Accidents?
So you have to look at everything really close up?
- Tim, what a great idea! - Oh, no!
Ooh! I love getting microscopic.
Magical! Majorly, majorly magical.
Sure, till we get eaten or baked into a pie.
translation.es: Hasta que nos coman o nos hagan un pastel.

translation.en: Let's explore, class. - Whoa! - Cool.
Hey, guys. How about we suit up to boot up?
translation.es: Chicos, ¿qué tal si nos preparamos para subir?

translation.en: Yeah, that's good.
I'm rock climbing on a boot.
Okay, look closely, everyone.
Anything could be an invasive species that throws off the island's delicate balance.
translation.es: Podría haber una especie invasora que altere el equilibrio de la isla.

translation.en: An invasive species is a plant or animal the island's not ready for?
translation.es: ¿Una especie invasora es algo para lo que la isla no está lista?

translation.en: Yes to the guess from DA.
If things that already live here have no defense,
translation.es: Si lo que vive aquí no tiene defensa,

translation.en: the new species can take over and change everything.
translation.es: la nueva especie puede atacar y cambiar todo.

translation.en: And change everything...
- Wow! This is absolutely-- - The reason they invented sneaker spray.
translation.es: - Esto es... - La razón por la que hay talco para pies.

translation.en: Ugh! This guy's a walking cautionary tale.
He's been hiking in the woods back in his home country.
translation.es: Parece que caminó en el bosque en su país natal.

translation.en: Let's hope there were no invasive hitchhikers.
We have insects.
Those look like insect eggs.
By Jyoti, you're right.
These eggs could mean the unwelcome arrival of a whole family of gypsy moths.
translation.es: Y podría ser la inoportuna llegada de una familia de polillas.

translation.en: You don't want that. Here's what they can do.
translation.es: No queremos eso. Pueden hacer esto.

translation.en: Here's before.
And here's after!
That poor ecosystem.
It was totally defenseless against the invasive species.
All that could happen because he didn't clean his--
translation.es: Todo eso podría pasar porque no limpió...

translation.en: Wow! Have you seen a dirtier boot? It's a banner ad for yuck!
translation.es: Todo eso podría pasar porque no limpió... Qué bota más sucia. Es un canto al asco.

translation.en: Sorry.
What else is in those boots, sir?
Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
I think so, but who would invest in a rocket- powered tortoise?
translation.es: Eso creo, pero ¿quién invertiría en una tortuga a cohete?

translation.en: No! I mean, that the new Ms. Frizzle keeps talking about invasive species
translation.es: ¡No! La nueva Srta. Rizos habla de especies invasoras

translation.en: because she is one.
Relax. She's got a sense of humor. I can work with that.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Tiene sentido del humor. Eso me gusta.

translation.en: Don't you get it? It's part of her plot.
translation.es: ¿No entiendes? Es parte de su plan.

translation.en: Our classroom is a perfectly balanced ecosystem like these islands.
translation.es: Nuestra clase es un ecosistema equilibrado como esta isla.

translation.en: We need to protect it.
What are you doing?
Oh, just protecting our ecosystem from an invasive teacher, that's all.
translation.es: Arnoldo, ¿qué haces? Protejo nuestro ecosistema de una maestra invasora.

translation.en: Starting with her plant.
Hey! Actually, looks good on you. Sets off your shell.
translation.es: Te queda bien. Resalta tu caparazón.

translation.en: All aboard, class. - Bus, undo your stuff. -
translation.es: ¡Todos a bordo, clase! ¡Autobús, deshaz lo tuyo!

translation.en: Ms. Friz, I mean, Professor Frizzle?
Hi, Arnold. Meet my new research assistant, Goldie.
translation.es: Hola, Arnoldo. Él es Goldie, mi asistente.

translation.en: What is it? Looks like a golden tamarin monkey.
translation.es: - ¿Qué tienes? - Parece un tamarino león dorado.

translation.en: - I mean, what else is it? - I'm not sure how to say this, but...
translation.es: - Digo, ¿qué te pasa? - No sé cómo decirlo, pero...

translation.en: You need to come back!
What's the problem?
Your sister is nice and everything, but she's new.
translation.es: Su hermana es agradable, pero es nueva.

translation.en: Yes?
And new things are always trouble.
It's like on the Galapagos.
Something new could totally upset their whole ecosystem.
translation.es: Algo nuevo podría alterar todo el ecosistema.

translation.en: True. Sometimes a new species can be a problem, but not always.
translation.es: Sí. A veces una especie nueva puede ser un problema, pero no siempre.

translation.en: - - Honeybees were new to North America.
translation.es: Las abejas fueron nuevas una vez aquí.

translation.en: But they became part of a new balance. No disasters at all, just yummy honey.
translation.es: Y formaron un nuevo equilibrio. Sin desastres, solo deliciosa miel.

translation.en: So ecosystems always create a new balance over time, but it's not always bad.
translation.es: Los ecosistemas siempre crean un nuevo equilibrio, y no siempre es malo.

translation.en: Sometimes it works out wonderfully, like with the honeybee.
translation.es: A veces funciona de maravillas, como con la abeja.

translation.en: But with invasive species, it's not so good.
translation.es: Con las especies invasoras, no es tan bueno.

translation.en: I wish I knew how it will work out for our class.
translation.es: Desearía saber cómo será con nosotros.

translation.en: Maybe a little magic will help you figure that out.
translation.es: Quizá un poco de magia te ayude.

translation.en: - Magic? - Runs in our family, you know.
Thanks, Ms. Frizzle. I mean, Professor Frizzle.
translation.es: Gracias, Srta. Rizos. Digo, profesora Rizos.

translation.en: Hey, Arnold, one of my students hasn't adapted to the new teacher.
translation.es: Veo que uno de mis estudiantes no se adaptó a la maestra nueva.

translation.en: I'm supposed to ask about magic.
But I don't see how that will help me see how things will work out.
translation.es: No sé cómo puede ayudarme a ver cómo resultará todo.

translation.en: Let's go see.
Are you saying we should go ahead in time?
translation.es: ¿Dice que podemos viajar en el tiempo?

translation.en: Like my time- traveling auntie Meridiem will say one day,
translation.es: Como algún día dirá mi tía viajera en el tiempo:

translation.en: No better time to visit the future than the present! To the bus!
translation.es: No hay mejor momento para ir al futuro que el presente. ¡Al autobús!

translation.en: Cool. Salivating. - Just look at all that yummy tech. -
I wanna go to this school 30 years in the future.
translation.es: Quiero estudiar en esta escuela en 30 años.

translation.en: If I don't bring my grades up, I will be at this school 30 years in the future.
translation.es: Si no mejoro las notas, estaré aquí en 30 años en el futuro.

translation.en: Look! It's Arnold Jr., Wanda Jr., Ralphie Jr., everybody junior.
translation.es: ¡Miren! Arnoldo Jr., Wanda Jr., Rafa Jr., todos júnior.

translation.en: See, Arnold? The class's ecosystem has survived.
translation.es: ¿Ves, Arnoldo? El ecosistema de la clase sobrevivió.

translation.en: Nothing to worry about.
You're right. What a relief! I guess I was totally overreacting.
translation.es: Tiene razón. Qué alivio. Creo que exageré.

translation.en: Guys, wanna see my project on the huge Galapagos crisis?
translation.es: ¿Quieren ver mi proyecto sobre la crisis en las Galápagos?

translation.en: Crisis in the Galapagos? What's she talking about?
Maybe we'd better find out.
- No, no, this can't be happening. - Arnold, are you okay?
translation.es: - No puede estar pasando. - Arnoldo, ¿estás bien?

translation.en: That plant is growing everywhere.
I can barely see where we're going.
translation.es: No puedo ver por dónde vamos.

translation.en: These poor islands.
- At least it couldn't get any worse. - Oh, no, it is worse.
translation.es: - Al menos no podría ser peor. - No, sí que es peor.

translation.en: No!
This is not good.
Bunnies. Adorable! Best thing ever.
- This is a hare- raising situation. -
translation.es: Es una situación para poner las orejas de punta.

translation.en: Galapagos Gil? Is that really you?
The second. You must be the Frizzle class.
translation.es: El segundo. Son la clase de Rizos.

translation.en: My dad told me you might show up
And indeed we did.
So, what precipitated the profusion of this particularly perfidious plant?
translation.es: ¿Qué precipitó la profusión de esta planta tan penetrante?

translation.en: No one knows, but somehow it wound up on the islands
translation.es: Nadie sabe, pero apareció en las islas

translation.en: and threw off our ecosystem.
What's with all the bunnies?
Well, once the plant started taking over, they wanted to control the plants.
translation.es: Cuando las plantas empezaron a crecer, quisieron controlarlas.

translation.en: So they brought in bunnies to eat them.
translation.es: Trajeron conejos para que las comieran.

translation.en: But there was nothing to control the bunnies.
translation.es: Pero nada controlaba a los conejos.

translation.en: Exactly! So now we have two invasive species instead of one.
translation.es: Exacto. Y ahora tenemos dos especies invasoras en vez de una.

translation.en: That plant is obviously a non- native invasive species, but what is it?
translation.es: La planta es obviamente una especie no nativa invasora, pero ¿qué es?

translation.en: I know exactly what it is.
That's the magical, crazy- growing, must- stay- in- a- pot- at- all- times Crescit Leiunium Frizzlaeia vine!
translation.es: ¡Es la enredadera mágica que crece y debe ir en maceta Crescit Leiunium Rizaeia!

translation.en: Like the one on your desk 30 years ago?
translation.es: ¿Como la de su escritorio de hace 30 años?

translation.en: Exactly! Only how did it get here?
Did I accidentally cause this?
That would have been a terrible thing to do.
- Um, I'm sure it's not that bad. - But it is, Arnold.
translation.es: - Seguro no es tan malo. - Sí, lo es, Arnoldo.

translation.en: This is a really big mistake. I'm supposed to lead by example.
translation.es: Es un error muy grande. Debo dar el ejemplo.

translation.en: And if it was my fault, I don't know what I'll do.
translation.es: Y si fue mi culpa, no sé qué haré.

translation.en: Um, it is an example. Of plants, growing like crazy.
translation.es: Es un ejemplo. De plantas que crecen como locas.

translation.en: And taking over the islands.
Well, maybe I am an invasive species.
Maybe I shouldn't be here. Should I ask my sister to come back?
translation.es: y no debería estar aquí. ¿Le pido a mi hermana que regrese?

translation.en: I mean, you shouldn't take it so hard.
translation.es: No se lo tome tan a pecho.

translation.en: But still getting old Friz back? That would be amazing, huh?
translation.es: Pero ¿que vuelva la vieja Rizos? Eso sería genial.

translation.en: Arnold, no! No!
That settles it. I'm calling Valerie right now.
translation.es: Listo. Voy a llamar a Valeria.

translation.en: - Val, did I catch you at a bad time? - No. What's up?
Listen, I've really messed up. You see, what happened was--
translation.es: Escucha, lo arruiné todo. Lo que pasó fue...

translation.en: Wait!
Um, can I talk to the professor, privately?
translation.es: ¿Puedo hablar con la profesora a solas?

translation.en: You got it!
Hi, Arnold, what's on your mind?
Ah, right.
That plant? It was my fault. I did it. I left it on the island.
translation.es: Esa planta... Fue mi culpa. Yo la dejé en la isla.

translation.en: Goodness. Why in the sky would you do that?
With that plant in place of your mug, it was too much.
translation.es: Esa planta en lugar de su taza era demasiado.

translation.en: I know I'm the guy who hates change, but I caused the biggest change ever.
translation.es: Sé que odio los cambios, pero provoqué el peor cambio.

translation.en: In the form of plants and bunnies. Can you help us fix this?
translation.es: En forma de plantas y conejos. ¿Puede ayudarnos a resolverlo?

translation.en: Well, remember I said a little magic will help?
Yes! That's it! Magic bunny- disappearing spray!
Uh, no.
Wait. The best way to stop an invasive species is not let it invade in the first place.
translation.es: La mejor manera de detener una especie invasora es que no invada.

translation.en: Exactly! Good thinking, Arnold. Ooh, maybe you'd better get back now.
translation.es: Exacto. Bien pensado, Arnoldo. Ahora será mejor que regreses.

translation.en: Arnold. Hey!
Ms. Frizzle, you didn't leave the plant here. I did.
translation.es: Srta. Rizos, usted no dejó la planta. Fui yo.

translation.en: - What? - But I know how to fix it.
If we take it away before it causes trouble.
translation.es: Nos llevamos la planta antes de que pase todo.

translation.en: - To the bus, Arnold? - To the bus!
I left it right over here.
Tortoise, wait up!
No!
- Hang on, Arnold! - We're coming to help you.
Hang on, Arnold!
It's okay, Arnold, we're coming!
Oh, now that was a mistake.
- - Gotcha!
Plant going crazy!
Best class ever.
- Thanks, Ms. Frizzle. - Thank you, Arnold.
translation.es: - Gracias, Srta. Rizos. - Gracias a ti.

translation.en: Because of you, the carefully balanced ecosystem here will stay balanced.
translation.es: Por ti, el cuidado equilibrio del ecosistema se mantendrá.

translation.en: You know what, Mr. Perlstein? You're all right.
- You know what, Ms. Frizzle? So are you. -
Good ol' familiar desk.
Good ol' familiar pencil case. Good ol' familiar orthopedic cushion.
translation.es: Mi viejo estuche. Mi viejo almohadón ortopédico.

translation.en: And a new teacher. That is good new, like a honeybee.
translation.es: Y maestra nueva. Nueva buena, como una abeja.

translation.en: Hmm. Now what should go where?
There you go. The place of honor.
translation.es: Justo aquí. El lugar de honor.

translation.en: Perfect! Thank you, Arnold. And what's this?
translation.es: Perfecto. Gracias, Arnoldo. ¿Y qué es esto?

translation.en: Something I made. It's a pot with a motion sensor perimeter.
translation.es: Algo que hice. Una maceta con sensor de movimiento.

translation.en: That way, if this little guy gets roamy again, we'll know.
translation.es: Si esta amiguita se va de paseo, lo sabremos.

translation.en: The new kid just found her spot in the class ecosystem.
translation.es: La chica nueva tiene su lugar en el ecosistema.

translation.en: I like it. New year, new teacher, new balance.
translation.es: Bien. Año y maestra nuevos, equilibrio nuevo.

translation.en: You're going to have great new adventures, class.
I have one thing left to say to you.
translation.es: Solo tengo una cosa más que decirles.

translation.en: - What could that be? - Wahoo!
Well, Goldie, our adventure begins.
Although I'm going to miss those kids, including--
- - Arnold?
Hi, Professor Frizzle. Before you go, I had another question.
I know, Why didn't you just stay home from school today?
translation.es: Ya sé. ¿Por qué no me quedé en casa hoy?.

translation.en: Besides that.
Nature doesn't have fences to keep animals in their own ecosystems.
translation.es: No hay vallas que limiten los ecosistemas.

translation.en: So, what's stopping one from invading all on its own?
translation.es: ¿Qué impide que un animal invada todo?

translation.en: Wild animals do roam free inside boundaries
translation.es: Los animales son libres dentro de límites, como océanos y montañas.

translation.en: like oceans and mountains. But they like to stay
translation.es: Los animales son libres dentro de límites, como océanos y montañas. Se quedan en lugares donde tienen lo que necesitan.

translation.en: in places that have what they need to survive.
translation.es: Se quedan en lugares donde tienen lo que necesitan.

translation.en: Could be a small range, like one tiny island.
translation.es: Puede ser un lugar pequeño, como una isla.

translation.en: Or might be all the oceans in the world.
translation.es: O todos los océanos del mundo.

translation.en: Okay, so invasive species make a mess.
How do you fix it after the fact?
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo arreglas si no tienes una máquina del tiempo?

translation.en: It's hard to undo damage done.
What we can do is stop invasive species in the first place.
translation.es: Pero podemos detener las especies invasoras antes.

translation.en: Never set pets free in the wild.
And when you travel, be careful not to bring stowaways.
translation.es: Al viajar, tener cuidado de no llevar polizontes.

translation.en: Arnold! Time for your audition.
Right! Just let me practice my line.
- Oink, oink. - Audition? Oink? What are you up to now?
Just a little surprise for next time. Where will you be, Professor Frizzle?
Wherever the wind takes me, Arnold.
Wherever the wind takes me!
